articles.author: Amanda Macias, Brian Schwartz
articles.title: World's largest yacht, linked to Russian billionaire Usmanov, is seized by Germany - CNBC
articles.description: Germany's federal police informed European authorities in Brussels on Wednesday that a thorough investigation found the vessel was owned by Usmanov's sister.
articles.content: WASHINGTON German authorities said they have seized the world's largest superyacht following official confirmation that the vessel had links to Russian billionaire and business tycoon Alisher Usmanov… [+2495 chars]

articles.author: Sam Few
articles.title: West Ham blow away Lyon to reach Europa League semi-finals with goals from Craig Dawson, Declan Rice, Jarrod Bowen - Eurosport COM
articles.description: West Ham United reached their first European semi-final since 1976 with a clinical 3-0 demolition of Lyon in the second leg of their Europa League quarter-final
articles.content:
Jarrod Bowen celebrates scoring for West Ham

articles.author: David Wu
articles.title: Putin’s close ally issues nuclear threat over consideration by nations to join NATO - Sky News Australia
articles.description: Former Russian president Dmitry Medvedev has warned Russia could deploy nuclear weapons to a region in Europe over its concerns of two countries joining NATO.
articles.content: A former Russian president and close ally of Vladimir Putin warns Moscow could order the deployment of nuclear weapons to a European region after two countries flagged it may join NATO.Former Russian… [+2699 chars]

articles.author: Bojan Pancevski and Georgi Kantchev
articles.title: Russia Warns It Could Station Nuclear Forces in Europe if Finland, Sweden Join NATO - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The invasion of Ukraine has tilted public opinion in Finland and Sweden toward seeking membership in the U.S.-led alliance.
articles.content: Russia warned on Thursday that it could station nuclear forces in and around a Russian exclave in Northern Europe and bolster its military presence there if Finland and Sweden join the NATO alliance.… [+349 chars]
